raw_comment: I wonder If global warming could have to do leaf growth happening later in the year for the northern side. Maybe The temperature could make  it harder for plants to grow  via leaves.
ace_sentences: Global warming may cause leaf growth to happen later in the year in the northern side.
A higher temperature may make it harder for plants to grow leaves.
If global warming increases the temperature, then leaf growth may happen later in the year in the northern side.
